p: Among the Asia-Pacific countries, China has the most number of EV-A71-associated HFMD outbreaks and the best epidemiological surveillance records in the past decade. It has been observed that the circulation of EV-A71 is particularly dynamic in this region. In 1987, an HFMD outbreak was firstly reported in Hubei province [ 16]. Although HFMD has been reported since the 1980’s, disease etiology was not well-recognized until 2007 when > 80,000 cases and 17 deaths were reported [ 45].
